name: NSOperationQueue
desc: A queue that regulates the execution of operations.

items.name: - addOperation:
items.desc: Adds the specified operation to the receiver.

items.name: - addOperations:waitUntilFinished:
items.desc: Adds the specified operations to the queue.

items.name: - addOperationWithBlock:
items.desc: Wraps the specified block in an operation and adds it to the receiver.

items.name: - addBarrierBlock:
items.desc: Invokes a block when the queue finishes all enqueued operations, and prevents subsequent operations from starting until the block has completed.

items.name: - cancelAllOperations
items.desc: Cancels all queued and executing operations.

items.name: - waitUntilAllOperationsAreFinished
items.desc: Blocks the current thread until all the receiverâ€™s queued and executing operations finish executing.
